info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 4:55PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Clark and southeastern Spink Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 555 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Turton to near Raymond to near Hillside Colony. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Clark Colony around 600 PM CDT. Raymond around 605 PM CDT. Fordham Colony around 610 PM CDT. Carpenter around 615 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
